description: A 2L GORE-TEX PACLITE® PLUS jacket that's lighter than a pack of pencils and packs down smaller than a beer can. Whether you are mowing down miles on a thru-hike or looking for foul-weather protection that all-but-disappears into your summit pack and offers superb next-to-skin comfort, this shell has your back.
name: Mountain Hardwear Minimizer GTX Paclite Plus Jacket - Mens
